鱨字的基本解释

鱨
cháng
见“鲿”。

鱨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cháng］
［《廣韻》市羊切，平陽，禪。］
“鲿1”的繁体字。
(1)黄鲿鱼。又名黄颊鱼、黄颡鱼、鳡鱼。
(2)即鮠。鲿科鱼类的通称。
(3)毛鲿鱼。石首鱼科。体长，侧扁，呈灰褐色，头中大，吻纯尖，眼小，尾鳍双凹形。是大型食用海产鱼类之一。产于我国江浙沿海。

鱨字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鱨； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1479第18
【廣韻】市羊切【集韻】【韻會】辰羊切，?音常。【說文】揚也。【玉篇】黃鱨魚。【詩·小雅】魚麗于罶，鱨鯊。【傳】鱨，揚也。【疏】鱨揚者，魚有二名，釋魚無文。陸璣疏云：鱨，一名黃頰魚是也。似燕頭，角身，形厚而長大，頰骨正黃，魚之大而有力解飛者。徐州人謂之揚。黃頰，通語也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cháng］
["Guangyun" City Sheep Cut, Pingyang, Zen. ]
Traditional characters for "鲿1".
(1) Yellow finfish. Also known as yellow cheek fish, yellow catfish, eel.
(2) That is, 鮠. Generic term for fish of the family Fryidae.
(3) Hairy finfish. Shitouidae. The body is long, flat on the side, grayish brown, with a medium-sized head, a sharp snout, small eyes, and a biconcave tail fin. It is one of the large-scale edible seafood. Produced in the coastal areas of Jiangsu and Zhejiang.
鱨

It resembles a swallow head, a horned body, thick and large, with yellow cheek bones, and a fish that is big and powerful for flying away. Xuzhou people call it Yang. Yellow cheeks, speaks well.
